comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The ship has an interesting story. A german passenger liner, converted at the German naval base in Tsingtao to an armed auxiliary cruiser, made 11 "kills" of Allied ships. Then she surrendered in March, 1915 to the then-neutral U.S. When America entered the war, she was seized and converted to a U.S. Navy ship, the U.S.S. De Kalb. More at: navalwarfare.blogspot.com/2012/04/german-auxiliary-cruise...
